name: docker-staticmaps
description: Docker Static Maps is a simple system for hosting static maps and tile images for web apps, without relying on external services. Useful for mapping features in web and embedded applications.
features: Static Map Hosting: Serve map tiles without external dependencies. Complete independence.
Offline Capability: Maps work without internet connection. Reliable availability.
Web App Ready: Perfect for embedding in applications. Easy integration.
No External Services: Avoid third-party map API costs. Cost-effective solution.
Tile Server: Host your own map tile infrastructure. Full control over maps.
Self-Hosted: Keep map data and requests private. No tracking or limits.
